title: [Miasmic Verge, Outer Swamp]
description: Narrowing to an ultra thin track of solid ground, the pathway meanders through wide pools of stagnant water.  Duckweed and bladderwort create a verdant border to each of ovoid bodies and rainbow mold stretches across the stale surfaces.  Clouds of gnats thicken the air, their tiny bodies clinging to everything in their path.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, southwest, northwest
